Taupō tsunami: What scientists have discovered about rare 2022 event https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taupo-tsunami-what-scientists-have-discovered-about-rare-2022-event/P2UTIURCNJES5JC5M6LGI66H7A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taupo-tsunami-what-scientists-have-discovered-about-rare-2022-event/P2UTIURCNJES5JC5M6LGI66H7A/ Jamie MortonThe 2022 midnight tsunami was one of NZ's strangest natural events. How did it happen? Sun, 28 Jul 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Among 1700-odd earthquake events linked to a 13-month bout of unrest at Taupo volcano was a magnitude 5.6 event that struck just before midnight on November 30, 2022 – jolting residents awake and sending a small surge of water towards the shore that damaged boats at Four Mile Bay. Photo / Dan Hutchinson
